info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 3:46PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT VICTORIA AND NORTHEASTERN GOLIAD COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CST... At 346 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Speaks to near Salem to near Goliad. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Guadalupe, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Weser, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Telferner, Downtown Victoria, Fordtran, Schroeder, Dacosta, Ander, Wood Hi, and Mission Valley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 626 and 634. US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 648. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 588. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 822. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
